stimulusHtml: Which of the following can be used to replace  /* missing code */  so that the code segment works as intended?

features.html:
Consider the following code segment, which is intended to print the sum of all the odd integers from 1 to 101, inclusive.

 

int r = 1;
int sum = 0;

while (r <= 101)
{
   /* missing code */
   r++;
}
System.out.println(sum);
